title: If you don't move on, you'll think it's the world.
subtitle: 如果你不往前走，你就会认为这是世界

title: It is only when you are pursued that you become swift.
subtitle: 唯有在被追赶的时候，你才能真正地奔跑

title: If you shut the door to all errors, truth will be shut out.
subtitle: 你如果拒绝面对错误，真相也会被挡在门外

title: Our life is what our thoughts make it.
subtitle: 我们的思维成就了我们的生活。

title: To be is to be perceived.
subtitle: 存在即被感知.

title: Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see the shadow.
subtitle: 保持面朝阳光，你将不会见到阴暗。

title: We live only to discover beauty. All else is a form of waiting.
subtitle: 活着只为发现美，其他一切只是一种等待。
